edu.purdue.dtf

Class GameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • edu.purdue.dtf.GameActivity

  • public class GameActivity
extends Activity
    GameActivity is responsible for the basic Android wrapper of the game. It owns the main game view and board, and sets everything up between the two. It is also responsible for the top level Android process lifecycle events.
